long_description: A must for any first aid or emergency kit, the 50g QuikClot(R) Advanced clotting sponge from Z-Medica stops moderate to severe bleeding until further medical help is available. QuikClot is a chemically inert material in a mesh bag that speeds coagulation of blood, resulting in a stable clot that stops bleeding. Zeolite clotting beads are contained in a sterile, non-adherent mesh bag for easy application and removal. QuickClot is safe to use and features a low-heat formula that won't burn skin. Package contains a 5 x 5 in. (50g) bag of QuikClot for coverage of large wounds.
short_description: A must for any first aid or emergency kit, the 50g QuikClot(R) Advanced clotting sponge from Z-Medica stops moderate to severe bleeding until further medical help is available.
